title: Graphic Design
description: Throughout this degree, I've improved on generating, developing, and materializing ideas, concepts, and graphics for complex communication programs. I acquired technical capabilities and skills as well as the correct use of methods and processes associated with Graphic Design.

title: Graphic Arts
where: ASP im. Jana Matejki w Krakowie
description: During this mobility, I developed my knowledge of photography, visual communication, typography, and poster design. I also participated in a 3-month course where I learned about traditional printing techniques (Lithography, mokulito, engraving, monotype...).

title: Web and Multimedia
description: This two-year vocational program focused on design and development skills to assist in the creation and upkeep of multimedia and web-based products.
